PAD.synopsis: Upturned earth and holes in the ground show that a bulette - a huge land shark - is nearby. A successful passive Nature check reveals that these are burrowing holes - Underdark characters know automatically.

PAD_0.speaker: Player
PAD_0.text: Something's burrowed in there - something big.

PAD_1.speaker: Player
PAD_1.text: There's tunnels everywhere - who would dig these? And why here?
